title: Design Task Form
description: Create a form to input tasks with fields for title, description, and status.

title: Implement Task Creation
description: Write logic to handle task creation and update the state.

title: Set Up Task Status Lanes
description: Build lanes like 'To Do', 'In Progress', and 'Done' in the UI.

title: Develop Drag-and-Drop
description: Enable drag-and-drop to move tasks between status lanes.

title: Create Delete Functionality
description: Allow users to delete tasks and remove them from the state or database.

title: Build Edit Feature
description: Enable task editing by pre-filling the form with existing task data.

title: Add Task Search Feature
description: Implement search functionality to filter tasks by title or status.

title: Test and Debug Features
description: Ensure all features are working as intended and fix any bugs.

title: Add User Authentication
description: Secure the app by adding user authentication for managing tasks.

title: Integrate Notifications
description: Send reminders for upcoming task deadlines or changes.

title: Optimize Performance
description: Improve the app's performance and ensure smooth interactions.

title: Deploy the App
description: Host the application and make it live for users.
